feed.title: Safety Nerds
feed.subtitle: Safety Nerds is a Community of Practice . We are a community of people in tech, and other disciplines like human factors, safety science, pilots, accident investigtors, sociologists, authors, academics, who come togther to learn from with with each other on [How Complex Systems Fail](https://how.complexsystems.fail/ ) [Introduction to Communities of Practice by Wenger-Trayner](https://www.wenger-trayner.com/introduction-to-communities-of-practice/) during incidents and outages
